price: Nokorε sε Yεnkyεn no ͻbεn, na (εhͻ) yε nkyi pa (ma no).
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
